Detailed Description

The connection response packet.

See also:
npConnectionResponseData, tServerConnectionResponse

int RainbruRPG::Network::NetPacketBase::convert ( int  i  )  [protected, inherited]

Convert an int to the little-endian Byte Order.

If your CPU work in little-endian, it does nothing but if it is big-endian, a conversion is needed.
